TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TransformPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: Represents a control that can be moved, resized, or rotated within a two-dimensional space.

span.span: Represents a control that can be moved, resized, or rotated within a two-dimensional space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对此控件模式的支持并不限于桌面上的对象。Support for this control pattern is not limited to objects on the desktop. 只要子级可以移动、 调整大小或容器的边界内自由地旋转，则还必须受到容器对象的子级支持此控件模式。This control pattern must also be supported by the children of a container object as long as the children can be moved, resized, or rotated freely within the boundaries of the container.

summary.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个包含已缓存的结构 [！控件模式的 INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存的属性值必须已以前请求过使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用来获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CanMoveProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，根元素传递给返回的集合的函数[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]子代的根并符合一组属性条件的元素。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须从与以获取当前值的引用。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果获得使用，它只包含已缓存数据，并尝试获取的任何属性的当前值引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用来获取一个属性，以前使用指定的缓存的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public void Move (double x, double y);
.method public hidebysig instance void Move(float64 x, float64 y) cil managed
Public Sub Move (x As Double, y As Double)
public: void Move(double x, double y);

param.name: x
param.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.

param.name: y
param.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.
Moves the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能移动、 调整大小或旋转以便其生成的屏幕位置将完全位于坐标其容器的和键盘或鼠标无法访问外部对象。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶层窗口移动完全屏幕或子对象移动容器的视区边界之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这些情况下该对象被放置靠近尽可能使用顶部或左侧坐标被覆盖以位于容器边界内所请求的屏幕坐标。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，控件模式的均来自和随后用于移动。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to move the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

span.span: The property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

span.span: Identifies the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 模式标识符传递到方法，如若要从指定检索控件模式感兴趣的。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，控件模式的均来自。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Resize (double width, double height);
.method public hidebysig instance void Resize(float64 width, float64 height) cil managed
Public Sub Resize (width As Double, height As Double)
public: void Resize(double width, double height);

param.name: width
param.span: The new width of the window, in pixels.

span.span: The new width of the window, in pixels.

param.name: height
param.span: The new height of the window, in pixels.

span.span: The new height of the window, in pixels.
Resizes the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用控件上时，支持拆分窗格，此方法可以产生副作用的大小调整其他相邻窗格。When called on a control that supports split panes, this method can have the side effect of resizing other contiguous panes. 不能移动、 调整大小或旋转以便其生成的屏幕位置将完全位于坐标其容器的和键盘或鼠标无法访问外部对象。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶层窗口移动完全屏幕或子对象移动容器的视区边界之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这些情况下该对象被放置靠近尽可能使用顶部或左侧坐标被覆盖以位于容器边界内所请求的屏幕坐标。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，控件模式的均来自并随后用于调整大小。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to resize the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

span.span: The property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Rotate(float64 degrees) cil managed

param.name: degrees
param.span: The number of degrees to rotate the element.

span.span: The number of degrees to rotate the element.

param.span: A positive number rotates clockwise; a negative number rotates counterclockwise.

span.span: A positive number rotates clockwise; a negative number rotates counterclockwise.
Rotates the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能移动、 调整大小或旋转以便其生成的屏幕位置将完全位于坐标其容器的和键盘或鼠标无法访问外部对象。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶层窗口移动完全屏幕或子对象移动容器的视区边界之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这些情况下该对象被放置靠近尽可能使用顶部或左侧坐标被覆盖以位于容器边界内所请求的屏幕坐标。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，控件模式的均来自并随后用于旋转。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to rotate the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#102)]
